title: LoL Stat For Windows 8.1/WP 8.1

embed.description: Learn more about LoL Stat by Eddy Boughioul and download it from the Windows Store

body:
Hi,
i come here to present my app for Windows Phone 8.1 and Windows 8.1.

With LoL Stat you can :
- Show recent games
- Show current game
- Store summoner
- Show ranking information
- Show ranked stat by champion

You can do some suggestion if you want.
I thank PlumeO for her help (draw the logo).

More info here : [http://youtpout.github.io/LoL-Stat/](http://youtpout.github.io/LoL-Stat/)
